amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to add t o a National Academy of Sciences report consideration of an analysis on whether the Corps considers cumulative benefits of locally developed projects, including Master Plans, and if the Corps uses these benefits for purposes of benefit-cost analysis for potential projects within such Master Plans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Esty (CT).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
